rows.label: tev030701_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Zurranik about the Ma-non's arrival on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Zurranik about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Zurranik about the enemy attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Zurranik about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Zurranik for information on tyrants.

rows.label: tev030701_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Zurranik if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0001
rows.name:
All we were hoping for was a nice, peaceful voyage
through space, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0002
rows.name:
But then something went horribly wrong, and we got
dumped on this freak show of a planet with indigens
on one side and and and the Ganglion on the other![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0003
rows.name:
If you hadn't have come along, we'd probably be in
really serious trouble?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0004
rows.name:
We're just not as good at starting and fighting wars as
you guys, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0011
rows.name: Have you ever heard of of Miralife Cards?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0012
rows.name:
They're these super awesome collectible cards with
pictures and cool little factoids about all the indigens
on Mira, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0013
rows.name:
They sell them in packs of five, okay? Oh, and there
are rare gold cards that are kind of hard to come by...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0014
rows.name:
I guess it's tough to collect all of them without a little
help from friends, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0023
rows.name:
It seems many people were concerned that the enemy
managed to get inside New LA, were they not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0024
rows.name:
But so long as we have our technology and your
courage, there's nothing to worry about, correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0025
rows.name:
The universe may be big, but nothing out there is a
match for the old Ma-non-BLADE tag team combo,
am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0026
rows.name:
It's only a matter of time before we wipe the floor with
these Ganglion losers, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0030
rows.name:
Those Miralife Cards are really taking NLA by storm,
don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0031
rows.name:
My favorite is Series 17: Bio-behemoths!
It includes these awesome "Real Aprica" cards that
everyone is going wild for, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0032
rows.name:
Apparently if you collect them all and lay them out in
the the right order, you can actually re-create a
life-sized aprica?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0033
rows.name:
With my luck, I'll probably still be be trying to complete
the set a century from now...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0042
rows.name:
I heard you bumped into some kind of "chimeroid" in
the Lifehold Core, did you not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0043
rows.name:
Well, there's apparently some manner of insanely
powerful chimeroid hiding out in Noctilum's
Vitriol Cesspool?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0044
rows.name:
Be a real BLADE and go go find out what it is.
You knowâ€”so they can make a new Miralife Card?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0049
rows.name:
Right now, the talk on our ship is all about the
dangerous incidents that have been happening, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0050
rows.name:
You'll just be be hanging around, doing some work
outside, when suddenly some sniper decides to shoot
at you... So scary, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0051
rows.name:
But Heradot went out to work anyway, because I
guess she's not not scared? Talk about guts![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Zurranik about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0052
rows.name: I think I'm jealous of Heradot right now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0053
rows.name:
She takes one lousy bullet, and everyone starts lavishing
her with with pizza? Unbelievable![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0054
rows.name:
Maybe I should go go get shot so people help me
complete my Miralife Card collection.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030701_MSG0055
rows.name:
...What's that? You already defeated the enemy?
But how am I going to get sympathy-shot now?[ST:wait ]
